title: Pirzada takes notice of Illegal use of Ministry resources
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 12 (APP):Minister for Housing and Works Mian Riaz Hussain Pirzada has taken serious notice of the illegal use of vehicles and staffers of the Ministry of Housing and Works.
He has directed that all former officers still using the ministryâ€™s staffers and material resources in violation of the rules be notified in writing and asked to return them immediately.
Reaffirming his commitment to zero tolerance for corruption within the ministry, the minister said that any level of corruption found will be rooted out during his tenure.
He also instructed the administrative wing to take action in this regard and submit a report within a few days.
Earlier, the minister was briefed that several retired senior officers were still utilizing ministry vehicles and staff.
